name: Gravity Fight
description:
A vibrant one-on-one action adventure. Fight with your friends in a japanese alley and defeat your opponent with chaotic explosive cans, but be careful, gravity doesn't always work the same way.

Enjoy the most amazing action with this game inspired by the Japanese streets. A two-player game that combines dual fighting with gravity changes.Your mission will be to knock down your opponent with explosive cans and avoid being hit, but you will have to keep in mind what plane you are on. Gravity will make you heavier or lighter, don't you want to be the one who gets hit?

Jump, dodge, throw explosive cans and let yourself be invaded by this frenetic dual game
